example.text: #Title42 expires this Thursday and President Biden refuses to do anything about it. It’s shameful. We need to secure our border and finish the wall to keep fentanyl out of our communities and protect our families. [[url]]

I urge the President to quickly sign it into law because too many families have lost a loved one to the opioid epidemic. Legislation Introduced by Feenstra to Combat the Opioid... Today, the US House of Representatives passed the Rural Opioid Abuse Prevention Act, which was originally introduced by US Reps. Randy Feenstra (R-Hull) and Conor Lamb (D-PA).

I was honored to be named a Fiscal Hero by the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget for my work to balance our federal budget and end wasteful spending. In the 118th Congress, I will continue to work to bring fiscal responsibility back to our nation's capital.

President Biden needs to catch a clue. [[user]] passed a responsible deficit reduction package that slashes $4.8 trillion in wasteful spending from the federal budget and protects American taxpayers. His unwillingness to negotiate is ridiculous. [[url]]

I agree 100% w/ [[user]]. President Biden's new mortgage rule will punish responsible homeowners who are already struggling from inflation. If President Biden wants to ease the pain of inflation on our families, he must rescind this costly rule. [[url]]

That's why I helped introduce the Agriculture Foreign Investment Transparency Act to monitor foreign purchases of US farmland and protect our national and food security. American farmland belongs to American farmers and this is the first step to making sure it stays that way.

I urge the President to quickly sign it into law because too many families have lost a loved one to the opioid epidemic. Legislation Introduced by Feenstra to Combat the Opioid... Today, the US House of Representatives passed the Rural Opioid Abuse Prevention Act, which was originally introduced by US Reps. Randy Feenstra (R-Hull) and Conor Lamb (D-PA).
